## Ucitavanje potrebnih biblioteka

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(car)
library(FSA)
library(reshape2)
```

Mapa korelacija numerickih varijabli za train skup:

```{r}
num.data <- train[sapply(train, is.numeric)]
corr <- cor(num.data, use = "complete.obs")

corr.melt <- melt(corr)

ggplot(corr.melt, aes(x = Var1, y = Var2, fill = value)) +
  geom_tile(color = "white") +
  geom_text(aes(label = round(value, 2)), size = 3) +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "PRGn", type = "div", limits = c(-1, 1)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  coord_fixed() +
  labs(title = "Train: Heatmap korelacija numerickih atributa (sa brojevima)", x = "", y = "", fill = "Corr")
```
